name: The Totally Sane Space Soldier Simulator
name_original: The Totally Sane Space Soldier Simulator
description:
Just an ordinary space shooter game. Nothing kooky going on. Nope, absolutely nothing about child trauma or an omnipresent narrator. You can absolutely trust this description. 100% percent. By the way, who are you? What is you? Wanna find out? Why not stop by and play?

Made for Extra Credits Game Jam #3.

Music Credits:

Music from :
